edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.ngram.trie

Class NgramTrieQuant

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sphinx.linguist.language.ngram.trie.NgramTrieQuant

  • public class NgramTrieQuant
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for ngram weights quantation. Stores quantation tables for each ngram order for probabilities and backoffs, while ngrams store pointers to this tables. Size of table is specified by quantation parameter, for default QUANT_16 each weight has 65k entries table.

    • Method Detail

      • setTable

        public void setTable(float[] table,
            int order,
            boolean isProb)
        Setter that is used during quantation reading
        Parameters:
        table - - array of weights to be used as quantation table
        order - - ngrams order which quantation table corresponds to
        isProb - - specifies if provided table is for probability (backoffs otherwise)

      • getProbTableLen

        public int getProbTableLen()

        Returns:
        length of quantation table.

        public int getBackoffTableLen()

        Returns:
        length of quantation table

      • getProbBoSize

        public int getProbBoSize()
        Getter for size of quantaized weights in ngram trie.
        Returns:
        amount of bits required to store quantized probability and backoff

      • getProbSize

        public int getProbSize()
        Getter for size of quantaized weight in ngram trie
        Returns:
        amount of bits required to store quantized probability

      • readProb

        public float readProb(NgramTrieBitarr bitArr,
             int memPtr,
             int bitOffset,
             int orderMinusTwo)
        Reads encoded probability from provided trie bit array and decodes it into actual value for specific ngram
        Parameters:
        bitArr - - trie bit array
        memPtr - - memory pointer for specific ngram order
        bitOffset - - offset from memPtr that is calculated according to ngram index
        orderMinusTwo - - order of ngram minus two
        Returns:
        probability of ngram

      • readBackoff

        public float readBackoff(NgramTrieBitarr bitArr,
                int memPtr,
                int bitOffset,
                int orderMinusTwo)
        Reads encoded backoff from provided trie bit array and decodes it into actual value for specific ngram
        Parameters:
        bitArr - - trie bit array
        memPtr - - memory pointer for specific ngram order
        bitOffset - - offset from memPtr that is calculated according to ngram index
        orderMinusTwo - - order of ngram minus two
        Returns:
        backoffs of ngram
